# How do I write a smart contract?

Smart contracts are usually written by developers using a dedicated language. In Cardano, there is Plutus, and Marlowe for non-programmers. Haskell can also be used. Visit [developers.cardano.org](https://developers.cardano.org/docs/smart-contracts/) to find out more about writing smart contracts.
